translations.translation: On that Day they will be partners in the punishment.
So, they will become partners in punishment.
On that Day, they will all share the chastisement.
On that day they will all share the torment.
So this day they all are partners in the punishment.
Then verily, that Day, they will (all) share in the torment.
So they shall on that day be sharers in the chastisement one with another.
So all of them on that day are sharers in the chastisement.
Then lo! this day they (both) are sharers in the doom.
On that Day they will all share the punishment:
So verily on that Day they all in the torment will be sharers.
So, that day they will share the punishment.
Truly, that Day, they will (all) share in the Penalty.
Then verily, that Day, they will (all) share in the torment.
Therefore, on that Day they will all share Our punishment.
On that Day, they will share in the punishment.
So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
[37:33] God, exalted be He, says: So they on that day, the Day of Resurrection, will share in the chastisement, for they shared in the error.
(Then lo! this day) which is the Day of Judgement (they (both) are sharers in the doom) the worshipper and those worshipped.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما تطاول وتمادى جدالهم وتخاصمهم، قيل لهم من قبل الحق: { فَإِنَّهُمْ } بأجمعهم ضالاً ومضلاً، تابعاً ومتبوعاً { يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي ٱلْعَذَابِ } المؤبد المخلد { مُشْتَرِكُونَ } [الصافات: 33] كما كانوا مشتركين في أسبابه وموجباته في النشأة الأولى
